name: Words Brain for World War Puzzles Games
name_original: Words Brain for World War Puzzles Games
description:
Scrambled and hidden words on a board is a game that is sure not to disappoint. Play it once and you'll be hooked, rest assured that this will keep anyone occupied for hours.


*** features ***

* Content
- Many Packages with boards ranging from 2x2 to 7x7
- UNIQUE in game features:
- Hint and Ask a Friend feature

* Look & Feel
- Smooth, polished touch interaction
- Colorful UI
- Fun sound effects
- Clean vector graphics and animations
